explanation: [0-0] A Golden Retriever stands in a bathroom, its rear covered in shower gel suds. A person wearing blue clothes holds the dog's tail with both hands, which are covered in light green silicone bath gloves. The area below the dog's rear is censored with pink mosaic.

[0-10] The gloved hands clean the dog's tail, moving upwards. Then, shower gel is poured into the gloves, revealing numerous raised light green stripes inside. The hands rub together continuously. Next, the hands, now covered in white shower gel, lather the dog's body. The Golden Retriever sits obediently in the bathroom, turning its head constantly. Afterwards, the dog stands as its rear end is washed, followed by its face.

[10-15] The two hands continue to wash the dog's face, then its flanks. Subsequently, the Golden Retriever lies on the floor as its back is scrubbed. Finally, the dog sits in the corner of the bathroom while water is used to rinse off the white shower gel.

[15-19] The scene then cuts to a person wearing grey clothes rinsing the silicone gloves under a tap, holding them by their sides. The Golden Retriever is then seen standing in the bathroom shaking its body, sending water droplets flying. Yellow subtitles appear below reading, "Good, shake it off."
